vote.title:
Authorize (1) an extension to the master agreement with Ambilabs, LLC for the continued purchase of neighborhood air quality sensor equipment for the Office of Environmental Quality and Sustainability and to extend the term from October 13, 2025 to April 13, 2026; and (2) the modification of the funding source from the Coronavirus State and Local Fiscal Recovery Fund to the ARPA Redevelopment Fund - Estimated amount of $67,000.00 -- Financing: ARPA Redevelopment Fund

*In alignment with CECAP.
